review: It works just the way it's supposed to. I am very pleased with my Chromcast. I plan to order another one soon
author: Joseph Davis

review: Got it for my teenage kids. Worked like a charm. Setup not bad.
author: Big Papa

review: "Casting" is now a feature in most streaming media players and the lack of a GUI kills the usability of the device. There are too many better alternatives on the market to recommend this device.
author: Username4me

review: I can't believe how long i waited to purchase this, its awesome.  So easy to setup, a third grader could do it. Phone to big screen in seconds. My favs, Netflix,  sho box, Pandora. Picture and sound Instantly improves from phone to your tv. Im buying more for all my tvs and as gifts.
author: D. Money $

review: the product works perfectly. Is easy to setting up and use. Work find with Samsum S3.
author: Jose

review: I Love It. Perfect for lazy people like me
author: jose

review: I thought it would do more but my grandson loves it.
